summary: Increases the amount of projectiles that will stick into the player and npcs to 15, up from 3, Also increases the duration to 60, up from 10 seconds, and lastly it increases the loose arrow count (arrows you miss with) from 15 to 20.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to \"Feather\" your enemies with arrows? me too, this mod fixes that.


----Description----
Increases the amount of projectiles that will stick into the player and npcs to 15, up from 3, Also increases the duration to 60, up from 10 seconds, and lastly it increases the loose arrow count (arrows you miss with) from 15 to 20.
I\'m hesitant to upload this because i found a mod that is VERY similar on the nexus, and has a whole bunch of options to choose from.  I\'m only going to upload this if my friend says he wants my version.
Here is the other mod (which includes many more options) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11165//?

Bug
Sometimes arrows will bounce off of people, this can be fixed by creating a new savegame
author: Capokid
